home.title: Welcome to my portfolio I'm Aida Fuentes
home.description: I'm a full-stack developer who loves crafting clean, scalable web applications. My goal is to build solutions that offer both exceptional performance and a delightful user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Aida Fuentes, a Full Stack Developer passionate about building web applications that combine functionality with outstanding user experience. After years in demanding environments like the gastronomy industry, I discovered web development as a way to channel my creativity and discipline into real technological solutions...

course1.title: Full Stack Web Development
course1.description: Intensive training in the development of modern web applications, both frontend and backend, software architecture, and cloud deployment.

course2.title: Higher National Diploma in International Trade
course2.description: Studies focused on international business, logistics, and commercial management.

job1.title: Full Stack Web Developer — KeepCoding, Spain
tasks: Development of full-stack web applications with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Implementation of REST APIs and secure JWT authentication.
Deployment of projects on AWS using Nginx and Certbot (SSL).

job2.title: Sous Chef — Andanza Restaurant, London
tasks: Development of time management and leadership skills.
Collaboration in menu creation and supervision of culinary quality.

1.title: BananaPeels
1.description: BananaPeels is a web platform for buying and selling products between individuals. It allows users to register, manage their listings, contact sellers through real-time chat, and mark favorites.

2.title: Password Generator
2.description: This project is a random password generator where you can configure the password length and choose which types of characters to include, such as uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols. It also includes functionality to copy the password to the clipboard with a single click.

3.title: Color-Palette Generator
3.description: This project is a simple tool for generating random color palettes in hexadecimal format. The palette is dynamically generated each time the user clicks the 'Generate palette' button.

4.title: PokePop
4.description: PokePop is a clone inspired by Wallapop, specifically designed for buying and selling Pokémon. It is a web application developed using HTML, CSS, and pure JavaScript (without frameworks), focused on managing products (Pokémon) and users through a clean, modular architecture.

5.title: Mood Weather — Mood Based on the Weather
5.description: Mood Weather is a full-stack application that connects a city's current weather with a mood, a recommended activity, and an inspirational quote. The user enters a city, and the app responds with a personalized set based on real weather data. Ideal for those seeking inspiration or an emotional connection with their surroundings.
